items.content_html: The project is a challenge proposed by the company Arquivei for a Jr. Front-End position. Goal is to make a SaaS that users can buy packs of consults for Brazilian fiscal document (NFe). Project is simple, but it is responsive for most devices and divided into components, easier to reuse.
